# Janitorial Services – Canso Canal, Port Hastings, Nova Scotia

**Bid Solicitation Reference Number:** cb-891-92046006 (1)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
**Regions of Opportunity:** Nova Scotia
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-10T14:00:00

## Background
Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires janitorial services for the Canso Canal facility located in Port Hastings, Nova Scotia. The facility is comprised of seven buildings, with a combined area of 776 sqm and is secured by 24/7 on-site security.

## Mandatory Site Visit
A mandatory site visit has been scheduled for May 2, 2024 at 11:15 am local time. All bidders are required to attend and sign an attendance list in order to have their bid submission considered responsive. Bidders must confirm their intention to participate in the site visit by April 30, 2024.

## Description of Work
The successful bidder will be responsible for providing daily janitorial services, including all labor, materials, tools, supervision, and equipment necessary to complete the required cleaning tasks.

## Contract Duration
The contract will be awarded for a period of one (1) year, with four (4) year option periods, extending the contract duration to March 31, 2025.

## Required Cleaning Seasons
The facility has two (2) mandatory cleaning seasons per year. Additionally, mandatory statutory holiday cleanings are required.

**Please note:** The tender has been cancelled.
